flow.comment: flow into recordCreates via influence over Company in run mode SystemModeWithoutSharing
flow.source_text:
<recordCreates xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
        <description>Creates a lead with user entered data</description>
        <name>Create_Lead</name>
        <label>Create Lead</label>
        <locationX>182</locationX>
        <locationY>734</locationY>
        <assignRecordIdToReference>created_id</assignRecordIdToReference>
        <connector>
            <targetReference>id_return</targetReference>
        </connector>
        <faultConnector>
            <targetReference>fault_handle</targetReference>
        </faultConnector>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Company</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>Company</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Description</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>description2</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>FirstName</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>First_Name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>LastName</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>Last_Name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Phone</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>Phone</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Title</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>title</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <object>Lead</object>
    </recordCreates>

flow.source_text:
<variables xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
        <description>user supplied title for lead</description>
        <name>title</name>
        <dataType>String</dataType>
        <isCollection>false</isCollection>
        <isInput>true</isInput>
        <isOutput>false</isOutput>
        <value>
            <stringValue>No Title Provided</stringValue>
        </value>
    </variables>

<recordCreates xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
        <description>Creates a lead with user entered data</description>
        <name>Copy_1_of_Create_Lead</name>
        <label>Copy 1 of Create Lead</label>
        <locationX>578</locationX>
        <locationY>1094</locationY>
        <assignRecordIdToReference>created_id</assignRecordIdToReference>
        <connector>
            <targetReference>Copy_1_of_id_return</targetReference>
        </connector>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Company</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>Company</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Description</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>description2</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>FirstName</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>First_Name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>LastName</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>fixed_last_name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Phone</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>fixed_phone</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Street</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>street</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <inputAssignments>
            <field>Title</field>
            <value>
                <elementReference>title</elementReference>
            </value>
        </inputAssignments>
        <object>Lead</object>
    </recordCreates>

        <description>user supplied title for lead</description>
        <name>title</name>
        <dataType>String</dataType>
        <isCollection>false</isCollection>
        <isInput>true</isInput>
        <isOutput>false</isOutput>
        <value>
            <stringValue>No Title Provided</stringValue>
        </value>
    </variables>

        <description>combines id from created case together with user input</description>
        <name>combine_vars</name>
        <dataType>String</dataType>
        <expression>{!create_case} + {!enter_text_subflow}</expression>
    </formulas>
